title: Raptor: Call of the Shadows (1994 Classic Edition)
notes: Fails silently, error in log: err:module:LdrInitializeThunk Main exe initialization for L"Z:\\home\\user\\.local\\share\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Raptor Call of The Shadows - 2015 Edition\\Raptor.exe" failed, stat$

title: Raptor: Call of the Shadows (1994 Classic Edition)
notes:
You need to skip the launcher by starting it like this:
user@computer:~/.steam/steam/steamapps/common/Raptor Call of The Shadows - 2015 Edition$ WINEPREFIX="/home/user/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/compatdata/336060/pfx" wine64 ./rapwin.exe

It works, but only windowed (640x480) and without audio.
